metadata.title: PotteLove Toilet-Bound Hanako-Kun Dakimakura Hanako-Kun - Anime Hugging Body Throw Pillow Cover Comfortable Pillowcases Soft Case for Home Sofa Living Room Bedroom Indoor 20 inch x 54 inch, White
description: Animation is now popular all over the world, especially among young people. It not only appears in the film and television works, but also in the game world. Therefore, it has become the love of many young boys and girls.Make your favorite cartoon characters into pillow covers and put them in any corner of your home, which can be the bed in the bedroom, the sofa in the living room, or the reclining chair in the study. This can not only decorate the room, but also enhance the happiness of life; The body pillow is also known as the hug pillow. This body pillow cover is applied to the pillow core of the corresponding size, so that you can feel the comfort and security brought by the hug during the lunch break or sleep, which is conducive to sleep.In addition, you can also give this pillow case as a gift to the partners who love animation. I believe they will like it.NOTE:Due to hand cut and hand controlled sewing,the size deviation around 6 Percent is permitted.Thank you for your understand.
